tool_description: Generates audience clusters based on location patterns, visit behaviors, and demographic similarities using machine learning clustering algorithms.

visit_patterns.description: Array of visit pattern data from pattern analyzer

clustering_algorithm.description: Clustering method: kmeans, dbscan, hierarchical, or auto

feature_weights.description: Weight values for location, behavior, and demographic features

minimum_cluster_size.description: Minimum number of users per cluster (10-1000)

error_messages: Insufficient pattern data: Provide at least 5 visit patterns for meaningful clustering.
Mismatched data sizes: Ensure visit_patterns and demographic_data arrays have compatible dimensions.
Invalid clustering algorithm: Use one of [kmeans, dbscan, hierarchical, auto].
Cluster count out of range: Set target_cluster_count between 2 and 50.
Invalid feature weights: Provide exactly 3 weight values that sum to 1.0.
Invalid cluster size: Set minimum_cluster_size between 10 and 1000.
Similarity threshold out of range: Set similarity_threshold between 0.1 and 1.0.
usage: Provide visit_patterns and demographic_data arrays; optionally configure clustering_algorithm, target_cluster_count, feature_weights, minimum_cluster_size, and similarity_threshold. Returns audience clusters with characteristics.

silhouette_score.description: Clustering quality metric ranging from -1 to 1

cluster_sizes.description: Array of cluster sizes (number of users per cluster)
